TopicTitle: PartTools dependency (TextMeshPro v1.0.56 for Unity 2017.3) missing

Articles.Content: I'm trying to install PartTools on Unity but I can't get the download for TMP v1.0.56 because the Google Drive link for direct download leads me to an error 404 page. Can someone provide me with an alternate download? Thanks!

I *could* be wrong... but if youre just modelling parts, you dont really need to instal TMP.... IIRC, TMP is mainly needed for KSP modding, for people needing  to create in-game UI's for plugins... vOv

I know *I* dont have it installed, for messing with parts & IVAs...

On 10/21/2022 at 8:12 AM, Stone Blue said:

I *could* be wrong... but if youre just modelling parts, you dont really need to instal TMP.... IIRC, TMP is mainly needed for KSP modding, for people needing  to create in-game UI's for plugins... vOv

I know *I* dont have it installed, for messing with parts & IVAs...

@Stone Blue I'm getting back into modelling, what tools do I need to be able to get started with developing part models/textures?
